name: Bomber Mad
description:
There are many versions of the bomber in the google store, with a classic play. We now produce a new version of bomber as Mad Bomber that has new ways to invite people to experience the same.
Previously, players search key and the door to pass the current level by break the bricks. Now Players must destroy enemies to get the key, kill boss to protect the door which make them pass through the level. These will make player exciting and comfortable.
Try the Bomber Mad game now!
publishers: IDTV  Viet  Nam Development Technology And Trading Investment Joint Stock Company
